Your main Responsibilities

You will be a part of defining the role going forward and you can look forward to the following responsibilities:

• Development in NAV 2009 and Navision Business Central

You will also have daily communication with operations in Denmark and our production in Poland.

Take on global freight transportation freight bill verification & payment process.
This includes audit and validating of all of our Ocean Freight and Air Freight.
Freight / Shipments Tracking with Forwarder / Lead Service Provider (LSP).
Responsible for executing standard operational policies / procedures / guidelines to ensure smooth and safe flow of goods and materials to meet the customer order fulfilment.
Operate and execute the hub consolidation load planning and optimization within the defined geographical regions.
Support / Monitor on KPI (Key Performance Index) / Service Level Agreement with LSP.
Provide statistical reports (Freight Spending / Volume Performance).
Capable of analyzing the reports generated and provide support/solutions.
On-going managing the LSP costs effectiveness and efficiency to achieve the set targets.
Provide market intelligence and rate development.
Support on Internal {company} Plants & Outsource Suppliers escalation and inquiries related to Freight Transportation / Logistics matters.
To interface and work with LSP to resolve operational issues.
BA in Logistics or Business or equivalent.
** Fresh graduates or with 1-2 years experience are welcome to apply."|"<article class=""jobs-description__container

GENERAL SUMMARY OF POSITION

  • Take on global freight transportation freight bill verification & payment process.
  • This includes audit and validating of all of our Ocean Freight and Air Freight.
  • Freight / Shipments Tracking with Forwarder / Lead Service Provider (LSP).
  • Responsible for executing standard operational policies / procedures / guidelines to ensure smooth and safe flow of goods and materials to meet the customer order fulfilment.
  • Operate and execute the hub consolidation load planning and optimization within the defined geographical regions.
  • Support / Monitor on KPI (Key Performance Index) / Service Level Agreement with LSP.
  • Provide statistical reports (Freight Spending / Volume Performance).
  • Capable of analyzing the reports generated and provide support/solutions.
  • On-going managing the LSP costs effectiveness and efficiency to achieve the set targets.
  • Provide market intelligence and rate development.
  • Support on Internal Ansell Plants & Outsource Suppliers escalation and inquiries related to Freight Transportation / Logistics matters.
  • To interface and work with LSP to resolve operational issues.
  • Position will be based in Malaysia.

KEY POSITION REQUIREMENTS

Education

  • BA in Logistics or Business or equivalent.
** Fresh graduates or with 1-2 years experience are welcome to apply.

Coordinate logistics preparation for training and workshop delivery

The PTP Senior Specialist is responsible for accurate and timely execution of various Accounts Payable tasks in one of the below areas in a dynamic and fast-paced GBS environment. All tasks must be executed in compliance with Zimmer Biomet policies and guidelines.

Duties & Responsibilities:

Invoice Processing:

  • Accurate and timely Vendor invoice approval management and processing
  • Query and issue resolution with vendors and stakeholders
  • Resolve matching discrepancies
  • Supporting internal stakeholders with the use of the invoice approval tools
  • Follow up with requestors/buyers and approvers
  • Close collaboration with BPO

Vendor Master Data Management:

  • Validation of completeness of Vendor Master Data documentation
  • Follow up with vendors and internal stakeholders on documentation
  • Vendor Master Data validation and maintenance
  • Close collaboration with Sourcing

Payment Processing:

  • Process payments following guidelines on a timely basis
  • Perform process controls and validations for completeness (ie forms etc)
  • Validate for and eliminate any erroneous or duplicate payments

General:

  • General tasks such as user support
column2: query handling and shared mailbox management
